reuters.title: AMES DEPARTMENT STORES <ADD> FEBRUARY SALES UP
reuters.body: Ames Department Stores Inc said sales for the four weeks ended February 28, the firstr month of its fiscal year, were up 30.4 pct to 113.6 mln dlrs from 87.1 mln dlrs a year earlier, with same-store sales up 28.6 pct. Reuter 
